description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi looks forward to sharing his thoughts on a number of themes and issues in the next 'Mann ki Baat' which is on 22nd May, 2016. As always, the Prime Minister looks forward to hearing from you the topics and ideas that he should speak on. So what are the themes, issues or t...
caption: mygov.in
message: Urging you to give ideas for #MannKiBaat to be held this Sunday. You can also call on 1800-11-7800. https://mygov.in/group-issue/share-your-ideas-mann-ki-baat-22nd-may-2016/
